item.description:
For this Meet-up we will return to the Pell Chafee Performing Center for "Hedwig and the Angry Itch." Here is the description of this critically acclaimed Broadway play:

Hedwig and the Angry Inch tells the story of a young East German named Hedwig Schmidt who tries to escape his country and come to America by getting a sex change operation and marrying a G.I named Luther. Sadly, the operation is botched and within a year Luther abandons Hedwig. Hedwig is left stranded and penniless in a trailer park in Kansas. Eventually, Hedwig falls in love with Tommy. Tommy soon leaves Hedwig when he becomes a Rock and Roll Superstar. Hedwig then forms her own band: The Angry Inch.

 

Ticket Information

Tickets are $25. Seating is General Admission.
Each person is responsible for purchasing their own ticket. For reservations, please visit Trinity Box Office or call 401-351-4242.

Please Note that Friday night shows are very popular and sell out early. Please do not wait to order your tickets! I strongly recommend that you order your tickets now.

 

Meet-up Logistics

We will meet just outside the theater on Empire Street.  The doors typically open at 7:30.  Since this is General Admission, it's important to be on-time so we can all sit together.  I will provide my cell phone number when you RSVP.  Please call me if you are running late.
item.how_to_find_us: In front of the theater on Empire Street
item.name: Hedwig and the Angry Itch
